library(exams)
library(gmp)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(plyr)
typ <- match_exams_device()
#--------------------------------------------------------
f <- function(n, r) {
  k <- 2
  v <- c()
  while (n >= k) {
    if (!(n %% k)) {
      v <- c(v, k)
      n <- n / k
    } else {
      k <- k + 1
    }
  }
  d <- table(v)
  z <- as.integer(names(d))
  if (all(d %% r == 0)) {
    return(as.expression(prod(z^(d %/% r))))
  }
  if (all(d %/% r == 0)) {
    return(str2lang(sprintf("%s^(1/%s)", prod(z^(d %% r)), r)))
  }
  str2lang(sprintf("%s*%s^(1/%s)", prod(z^(d %/% r)), prod(z^(d %% r)), r))
}
des <- f(100, 2)
des[2]
